summary: The BuildRequest has no explicit requirements; the diff only modifies project_state.json and does not show any mainnet deployment-related changes. The modified file introduces/records multiple feature entries with REQ-* IDs that were not requested by this BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project_state entries describing multiple school-website features (e.g., responsive multi-section site, visual theme rules, data-driven News & Events with detail views, Contact form submitting to backend, SEO/accessibility, generated images, branding updates) with REQ-* references, despite this BuildRequest only asking to deploy the current draft to mainnet and listing no requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest contains no feature requirements and focuses on deploying the current draft to Internet Computer mainnet; the diff shows only project_state.json being modified to include/track unrelated feature requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3, REQ-4, REQ-6, REQ-7, REQ-8, etc.).
